name: Bun Bun Escapes
description:
NOTE: Currently, this is a buggy prototype with only 3 levels. 

Bun Bun is great at murder but doesn't know how to escape. Can you help Bun Bun avoid getting caught?

Theme: Death is Only the Beginning. Bun Bun has already killed its target but it still has to find a way to escape!

Instructions: This is a puzzle game where you have to switch between tunnels to reach the exit (Exit is White Platform).

WASD - Move Bun Bun

Space - Switch Underground/Above Ground

Button at Right - Restart Button
